t: Amazon Business Small Business Grants 2024
s: Amazon Business is offering over $250,000 in grants and prizes to boost 15 small businesses. US-based Amazon Business customers with annual revenues up to $1M can apply from May 1–24, 2024.

s: Once an evaluation is complete, if an application meets the criteria, utility patent owners are granted an Amazon Patent Evaluation Express ID associated with this decision. Brands can use the ID from the winning evaluation to report future infringement of that patent through Report a Violation.

t: Amazon Business Small Business Grants 2025
s: Amazon Business is offering over $250,000 in grants and prizes to empower 15 small businesses in US. Voting runs from June 16-27. Recipients announced on July 21, 2025.

t: Amazon Business Launches Small Business Grants 2023 | Amazon Business
s: Applications for our second annual Amazon Business Small Business Grants are open. The deadline to apply is May 21, 2023. If you are a small business customer, learn how to apply here.

t: Amazon offers $20K grants to small businesses for innovative sustainability products
s: July 18, 2022 - New program supports small businesses that offer innovative, high-quality products built with sustainability in mind. Selected recipients receive $20,000, access to Amazon Launchpad, guidance, and selling opportunities.
